item.title: Moon Stuff
item.content:encoded:
Stuff I have collected from players. One more than others. ;)

New Moon (+1 levels)
New Moon Waxing (+1 levels)
Crescent Moon Waning (+1 levels)
Crescent Moon (+2 levels)
Crescent Moon Waxing (+3 levels)
Half Moon Waning (+1 Levels +1 Range)
Half Moon (+2 Levels +1 Range)
Half Moon Waxing (+3 Levels +1 Range)
Gibbous Moon Waning (+ 1 Levels, +2 Range)
Gibbous Moon (+2 Levels, +2 Range)
Gibbous Moon Waxing (+3 Levels, +2 Range)
Full Moon Waning (+1 Level, +2 Range, +1 strength)
Full Moon (+2 levels +2 range +1 strength)
Full Moon Waxing (+3 levels +2 range +1 strength)

You go up one moon "level" per win (ie, Crescent Waning to Half Waning), and the moon will wane once per each dayroll, and wax once when you fight in DH.
While not confirmed yet, it is possible that you will gain 2 levels if you fight a moon at a higher level, or same rank if you are half moon or higher, while in that case the loser loses 2 levels (ie New vs Crescent, New becomes Half. Half vs Half, winner goes full).
If you fight a lower level or between New and Crescent, you gain one level per win.
